long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
meetly.cloud Video Communication helps make collaborating via personalized video conferencing a breeze. Utilizing the powerful and open source Jitsi conferencing platform meetly.cloud provides all of the expected teleconferencing functionality users expect in this new era of remote work:

- High Definition Video and Audio Conferencing
- Text Chat
- Screen-sharing
- Support for multiple cameras + microphones

The service is setup for you so that you don't need to worry about unwanted parties dropping into a meeting without your permission. Once you create an account with meetly.cloud and setup your meeting schedule, users without any account at all can be invited using our meetly.cloud extension authentication system.

For that added personal touch, we also provide documentation to users to allow them to use their own website as a landing page for meetings. Want to send an invite with your own infrastructure? No problem! meetly.cloud is designed from the ground up to be able to integrate with your website by adding some very simple javascript to your preferred page. Help differentiate yourself from everyone else by appearing to host your own custom videoconferencing solution.

All that users need to do to join your meeting is install the meetly.cloud Video Collaboration extension and they are ready to go. Only the host needs to signup with the service.
